dict.string:
Access to the beer fridge is blocked since Rex Banner has enforced Prohibition.
Your job is to walk around and find all the necessary ingredients for beer in order to start your own brew.

You’ll be notified on your device when you’re in the general area (approx. 5m) of an ingredient.
Keep looking, as you you’re still too far away from the ingredient to gather it.
Sit tight! You've nearly found it.

You’ve managed to get within the range to gather the ingredient.
When the progress circle completes, you will receive a badge for the ingredient that you found.

Once you receive a badge, you should return to the beer fridge to see if you’ve found them all.
If ‘Prohibition is in effect’ then you need to keep looking.
